== Introduction ==

* My full name is Dax Solomon Umaming from Baguio City, Philippines
* Got into Ubuntu during the Hoary release back in 2005
* I'm into Python, C++, Java, and PHP/MySQL
* Currently employed at Benguet Electric Cooperative, Inc. as a Radio Operator (but technically doing software development tasks)
